languages.text: {n}Вооружившись и распалив боевой пыл ротгатом, дружины правителей агрокомплексов собрались, чтобы дать бой бесплотным нелюдям. Увы, обычное оружие было бессильно против духов, но, кажется, обилие гибнущих людей породило такой психический резонанс, что многие призраки развеялись или отступили.{/n}

{n}Arming themselves and inflaming their spirits with rotgut, squads of the agricultural facilities' various rulers gathered to fight the incorporeal xenos. Alas, conventional weapons proved to be wholly powerless against spirits, but it seems that the plethora of dying people had caused such a strong psychic resonance that many of the wraiths dissipated or retreated.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вооружившись и распалив боевой пыл ротгатом, дружины правителей агрокомплексов собрались, чтобы дать бой бесплотным нелюдям. Увы, обычное оружие было бессильно против духов, но, кажется, обилие гибнущих людей породило такой психический резонанс, что многие призраки развеялись или отступили.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Arming themselves and inflaming their spirits with rotgut, the squads of the various rulers of the agricultural facilities gathered to fight the incorporeal abhumans. Alas, the conventional weapons proved to be powerless against spirits, but it seems that the plethora of dying people had caused such a strong psychic resonance that many of the wraiths have retreated or got scattered.{/n}

{n}Arming themselves and inflaming their spirits with rotgut, the squads of the various rulers of the agricultural facilities gathered to fight the incorporeal abhumans. Alas, the conventional weapons proved to be powerless against spirits, but it seems that the plethora of dying people had caused such a strong psychic resonance that many of the wraiths have retreated or got scattered.{/n}

{n}Arming themselves and inflaming their spirits with rotgut, squads of the agricultural facilities' various rulers gathered to fight the incorporeal xenos. Alas, conventional weapons proved to be wholly powerless against spirits, but it seems that the plethora of dying people had caused such a strong psychic resonance that many of the wraiths dissipated or retreated.{/n}

{n}Arming themselves and inflaming their spirits with rotgut, squads of the agricultural facilities' various rulers gathered to fight the incorporeal xenos. Alas, conventional weapons proved to be wholly powerless against spirits, but it seems that the plethora of dying people had caused such a strong psychic resonance that many of the wraiths dissipated or retreated.{/n}

{n}Arming themselves and inflaming their spirits with rotgut, squads of the agricultural facilities' various rulers gathered to fight the incorporeal xenos. Alas, conventional weapons proved to be wholly powerless against spirits, but it seems that the plethora of dying people had caused such a strong psychic resonance that many of the wraiths dissipated or retreated.{/n}

languages.text: {n}农业设施的统治者联合在一起，喝着私酿的烈酒，鼓起信念，与无形的异形战斗。遗憾的是，常规武器对幽灵完全没有效果，但不断增加的死者似乎引起了强烈的灵能共鸣，许多幽灵都消散或撤退了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Arming themselves and inflaming their spirits with rotgut, squads of the agricultural facilities' various rulers gathered to fight the incorporeal xenos. Alas, conventional weapons proved to be wholly powerless against spirits, but it seems that the plethora of dying people had caused such a strong psychic resonance that many of the wraiths dissipated or retreated.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}农业设施的统治者联合在一起，喝着私酿的烈酒，鼓起信念，与无形的异形战斗。遗憾的是，常规武器对幽灵完全没有效果，但不断增加的死者似乎引起了强烈的灵能共鸣，许多幽灵都消散或撤退了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Armándose e imbuyendo a sus espíritus con rotgut, escuadrones de los diversos gobernantes de las instalaciones agrícolas se reunieron para luchar contra los xenos incorpóreos. Por desgracia, las armas convencionales resultaron ser totalmente inútiles contra los espíritus, pero parece que la gran cantidad de personas muriendo había causado una resonancia psíquica tan fuerte que muchos de los espectros se disiparon o se retiraron.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Arming themselves and inflaming their spirits with rotgut, squads of the agricultural facilities' various rulers gathered to fight the incorporeal xenos. Alas, conventional weapons proved to be wholly powerless against spirits, but it seems that the plethora of dying people had caused such a strong psychic resonance that many of the wraiths dissipated or retreated.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Armándose e imbuyendo a sus espíritus con rotgut, escuadrones de los diversos gobernantes de las instalaciones agrícolas se reunieron para luchar contra los xenos incorpóreos. Por desgracia, las armas convencionales resultaron ser totalmente inútiles contra los espíritus, pero parece que la gran cantidad de personas muriendo había causado una resonancia psíquica tan fuerte que muchos de los espectros se disiparon o se retiraron.{/n}

languages.text: {n}武装し、安酒を呑んで気分を高揚させた農業施設のさまざまな支配者たちの部隊が、霊的なゼノと戦うために集結した。残念なことに、通常の武器は精霊にはまったく無力であることが証明された。しかし、あまりにも多くの者の死にゆく様が、強い精神的共鳴を引き起こし、多くのレイスが消滅するか、退却したようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Arming themselves and inflaming their spirits with rotgut, squads of the agricultural facilities' various rulers gathered to fight the incorporeal xenos. Alas, conventional weapons proved to be wholly powerless against spirits, but it seems that the plethora of dying people had caused such a strong psychic resonance that many of the wraiths dissipated or retreated.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}武装し、安酒を呑んで気分を高揚させた農業施設のさまざまな支配者たちの部隊が、霊的なゼノと戦うために集結した。残念なことに、通常の武器は精霊にはまったく無力であることが証明された。しかし、あまりにも多くの者の死にゆく様が、強い精神的共鳴を引き起こし、多くのレイスが消滅するか、退却したようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Des escouades menées par les chefs de différentes installations agricoles s'assemblent, boivent des gorgeons de tord-boyaux pour se donner courage, puis prennent les armes pour affronter les xénos intangibles. Hélas, les armes conventionnelles se révèlent impuissantes contre les esprits, qui déciment les rangs humains ; toutefois, ces nombreuses agonies provoquent une résonance psychique si forte que bien des esprits se volatilisent ou battent en retraite.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Arming themselves and inflaming their spirits with rotgut, squads of the agricultural facilities' various rulers gathered to fight the incorporeal xenos. Alas, conventional weapons proved to be wholly powerless against spirits, but it seems that the plethora of dying people had caused such a strong psychic resonance that many of the wraiths dissipated or retreated.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Des escouades menées par les chefs de différentes installations agricoles s'assemblent, boivent des gorgeons de tord-boyaux pour se donner courage, puis prennent les armes pour affronter les xénos intangibles. Hélas, les armes conventionnelles se révèlent impuissantes contre les esprits, qui déciment les rangs humains ; toutefois, ces nombreuses agonies provoquent une résonance psychique si forte que bien des esprits se volatilisent ou battent en retraite.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Leiter der verschiedenen landwirtschaftlichen Einrichtungen bewaffneten sich, stählten sich mit Fusel und versammelten sich dann, um die körperlosen Xenos zu bekämpfen. Leider erwiesen sich konventionelle Waffen als machtlos gegen Geister. Die Vielzahl der sterbenden Menschen löste aber wohl eine derart starke psychische Resonanz aus, dass viele der Geister sich auflösten oder zurückzogen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Arming themselves and inflaming their spirits with rotgut, squads of the agricultural facilities' various rulers gathered to fight the incorporeal xenos. Alas, conventional weapons proved to be wholly powerless against spirits, but it seems that the plethora of dying people had caused such a strong psychic resonance that many of the wraiths dissipated or retreated.{/n}

Leider erwiesen sich konventionelle Waffen als machtlos gegen Geister. Die Vielzahl der sterbenden Menschen löste aber wohl eine derart starke psychische Resonanz aus, dass viele der Geister sich auflösten oder zurückzogen.{/n}
